first_para: Andrew Henry George (born 2 December 1958) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the constituency of St Ives in Cornwall since 1997. He is the current Vice-Chairman of the All Party Parliamentary Housing and Planning Group. and a qualifying member of the All Party Parliamentary Group on Carers.

full.extract:
Andrew Henry George (born 2 December 1958) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for the constituency of St Ives in Cornwall since 1997. He is the current Vice-Chairman of the All Party Parliamentary Housing and Planning Group. and a qualifying member of the All Party Parliamentary Group on Carers.
^ The Committee Office, House of Commons. "House of Commons website". Publications.parliament.uk. Retrieved 2010-09-30. 
^ The Committee Office, House of Commons. "House of Commons website". Publications.parliament.uk. Retrieved 2010-09-30.
full.title: Andrew George (politician)
